  • Uses of TdApi.InputMessageReplyTo in org.drinkless.tdlib

    Subclasses of TdApi.InputMessageReplyTo in org.drinkless.tdlib
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static class 
    TdApi.InputMessageReplyToExternalMessage
    Describes a message to be replied that is from a different chat or a forum topic; not supported in secret chats.
    static class 
    TdApi.InputMessageReplyToMessage
    Describes a message to be replied in the same chat and forum topic.
    static class 
    TdApi.InputMessageReplyToStory
    Describes a story to be replied.

    Field
    Description
    TdApi.InputMessageReplyTo
    TdApi.AddLocalMessage.replyTo
    Information about the message or story to be replied; pass null if none.
    TdApi.InputMessageReplyTo
    TdApi.DraftMessage.replyTo
    Information about the message to be replied; must be of the type inputMessageReplyToMessage; may be null if none.
